repositoryFilters.description: One or more repository filter blocks, containing a `filter` (required string filtering repositories, see pattern regex [here](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonECR/latest/APIReference/API_ScanningRepositoryFilter.html)) and a `filter_type` (required string, currently only `WILDCARD` is supported).

scanFrequency.description: The frequency that scans are performed at for a private registry. Can be `SCAN_ON_PUSH`, `CONTINUOUS_SCAN`, or `MANUAL`.
